raw_comment: I noticed that China has more of everything on the chart I wonder how China has more of everything than the U.S It kinda relates to to here in the U.S because we use most of these things on the chart as well. China uses more than us that makes us low country.
ace_sentences: I noticed that China has more of everything on the chart.
I wonder why China has more of everything than the U.S.
People in the U.S. use most of the things on the chart.
China uses more of these things than the U.S.
This makes the U.S. a low country.
